name: PublishHtmlReport
helpMarkDown: Replace with markdown to show in help

inputs.name: reportDir
inputs.label: HTML file Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: HTML file directory where PublishHtmlReport is run.

inputs.name: artifactName
inputs.label: HTML artifact name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the artifact that contains the HTML report.

inputs.name: htmlEntrypoint
inputs.label: Location of HTML entrypoint in artifact
inputs.helpMarkDown: The relative path to the file in the artifact to render the HTML off.
